mapper.select: /* cetusProgrmInfo.view */ SELECT UID ,PROGRM_NM ,URL ,PROGRM_DC ,USE_AT ,WORKPLACE_UID ,LEFT_SLIDE_IMG ,RIGHT_SLIDE_IMG ,LOGO_IMG ,COMPANY_LOGO_IMG ,TITLE1 ,TITLE2 ,TITLE3 ,IS_ROOT_URL FROM CETUS_PROGRM_INFO WHERE UID = #{uid}
/* cetusProgrmInfo.getProgramByUrl */ SELECT UID ,PROGRM_NM ,URL ,PROGRM_DC ,USE_AT ,WORKPLACE_UID FROM CETUS_PROGRM_INFO WHERE URL = #{url} AND WORKPLACE_UID = #{workplaceUid}::bigint

/* cetusProgrmInfo.getProgramFullInfoByUrl */ SELECT CPI.UID ,CPI.PROGRM_NM ,CPI.URL ,CPI.USE_AT ,CF_LEFT.FILE_ID AS LEFT_SLIDE_IMG_ID ,CF_RIGHT.FILE_ID AS RIGHT_SLIDE_IMG_ID FROM CETUS_PROGRM_INFO CPI LEFT JOIN CETUS_FILE CF_LEFT ON CF_LEFT.FILE_UID = CPI.LEFT_SLIDE_IMG AND CF_LEFT.USE_AT = 'Y' AND CF_LEFT.SAVED = 'Y' LEFT JOIN CETUS_FILE CF_RIGHT ON CF_RIGHT.FILE_UID = CPI.RIGHT_SLIDE_IMG AND CF_RIGHT.USE_AT = 'Y' AND CF_RIGHT.SAVED = 'Y' WHERE CPI.URL = #{url} AND CPI.WORKPLACE_UID = #{workplaceUid}::bigint
